name: Clumsy Chef
description: Clumsy Chef is a simple 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to play for the cook who just loves donuts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 250MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
